description:
Ashibe-kun receives his allowance from Ma. Yay! What should we buy? He heads straight to the candy store with Goma-chan, but he`s too hungry to think clearly about what he wants to buy. All right! We`ll go home to eat and then think about it again! But then Ashibe-kun keeps running into people in trouble on his way to his destination, and he dips into his allowance to help them...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ほしいものがいっぱい
